title: What amount of money do students get after getting an AIR of 1 in the NEET without coaching? - Quora

response.answer_text: Firstly it's not easy to get the AIR 1 U need to work hard and aim for a best score u can't aim that I would get this or that rank so first just fill Ur mind with all the concepts and practice each and every variety of questions and the previous year paper too in limited time these are the things will help u to get a good score in neet and maybe a good rank so firstly do this instead of thinking of afterwards just live in present and on behalf Ur question if anyone secure AIR 1 without coaching that is the big achievement and many of the coaching centres offer Ur money to just be on their holding in victory pose,or tell people that u have studied in coaching, motivating and giving tips to other neet aspirants and lots more it is just a type of 10–15 days celebrity but in college no one will ask Ur rank or number u will be treated equally. I think this is enough so just work hard I wish that may u achieve that AIR 1 . ALL THE BEST

See dude.. The institute in which you actually studied gives money in lakhs as they will be so popular and all new sheep and goats will line up for the rat race at their institute. The thing is there are thousands of coaching centers in India. The most prestigious coaching institutes like Aakash ,Allen ,resonance, etc give you money maybe around 80 lakhs to 1 crore just to publish your name and roll no. And other credentials in their colours even though you had distance learning or even had no connections whatsoever with their institute. AIR 1 in India dont worry you're a crorepati( millionaire).
